configurable.i18n_name: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_de: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_nl: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_fr: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_it: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_es: THE SKINNY CROPPED NASHVILLE MID DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_description: Push the realms of possibility with A very expensive brand’s The Skinny Crop jeans in Nashville mid distressed denim. The skinny crop women’s jeans have a skinny fit from top to bottom with a sublime second skin feel. Nashville mid distressed blue denim with tears and abrasions is the epitome of cool, edgy self-expression.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Mit A very expensive brands The Skinny Crop Jeans in Nashville Mid Distressed Denim wird Unmögliches Wirklichkeit. Die Skinny Crop Damenjeans sind vom Bund bis zum Saum im Skinny-Fit gehalten und tragen sich wie eine zweite Haut. Nashville Mid Distressed blauer Denim mit Rissen und Abschürfungen ist der Inbegriff einer coolen, einzigartigen Selbstdarstellung.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Verleg je grenzen met A very expensive brand's The Skinny Crop jeans in Nashville Mid Distressed denim. Deze korte skinny jeans voor vrouwen sluit om het lichaam als een tweede huid. Het Nashville Mid Distressed blauwe denim met slijtplekken is dé manier om je coole, moderne kant te laten zien.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Repoussez les limites du style avec ce Skinny Crop confectionné dans un denim Nashville Mid Distressed de 7 For all Mankind. Bel effet seconde peau pour ce jean skinny crop arborant une coupe skinny de haut en bas. Le denim bleu Nashville Mid Distressed arborant déchirures et traces d'usure est l'essence-même de la décontraction et de l'originalité stylée.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Sperimenta ogni possibile combinazione, con il jeans The Skinny Crop di A very expensive brand in denim Nashville Mid Distressed. Il jeans da donna skinny cropped ha una vestibilità skinny dall'alto al basso e regala la sensazione sublime di una seconda pelle. Il denim blu Nashville Mid Distressed con strappi e abrasioni è la quintessenza dello stile cool: trendy e con forte personalità.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Atrévete a lo imposible con los jeans The Skinny Crop con acabado Nashville Mid Distressed de A very expensive brand. Estos vaqueros de corte pitillo tobillero para mujer tienen un corte Skinny desde la cintura al bajo y calzan perfectamente como una segunda piel. El denim con acabado Nashville Mid Distressed con rasgaduras y abrasiones es la máxima expresión de un look desenfadado y atrevido.

  • 94.5% Cotton 4% Polyester 1.5% Elastane
